_header: An holy man was parish priest / And loved a friend that woned him next
Title(s): Northern Homily Cycle ; Adulterous Parish Priest
Subjects: adultery, tales of; clergy, sins of; penitence; confession; exempla
Bibliographic Ghosts: London, British Library Addit. 22283 [Simeon]: not in this MS.
_description: The Adulterous Parish Priest, in the Northern Homily Cycle — in couplets

BodSelSup52.First Lines:
A holy man þat was a prestþat lufyd afrend þat wonyd
                    hym nest…
BodSelSup52.Last Lines:
…þat we may at our endyng dayCom to þat blys
                    þat lastes ay

BodAsh42.First Lines:
A hali man was parihsse presteAnd lufid a frende þat wonid him
                    neste…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…Oure lorde iesu criste vs spedeTo do penaunce &
                    þider vs lede
BodAsh42.Editions:
Thompson,  Anne B.,
                        ed.  
             The Northern Homily
                    Cycle.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008.

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
AN holi mon was parisch prestAnd loued a frend þat woned him
                    nest…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Vre lord Ihesu crist vs spedeTo do penaunce and þider vs
                    lede Amen.
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title: Hou a prest lay by amayden (f. 205va)
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.
BodEngPoeta1.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             “Die Evangelien-Geschichten der Homiliensammlung des Ms. Vernon.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         57 (1877): 241-316: 297.

CULAdd8335.First Lines:
An holi man it was a presteÞat lufed a frende þat duelled
                    him neste…
CULAdd8335.Last Lines:
…Þat we may at oure endyng dayCome til þat ioy
                    þat lastes ay
CULAdd8335.Attributed Title:
narracio de sacerdote fornicante sed post ea penitente sed non
                        confitente (p. 283)

CULDd11.First Lines:
AN holi man was a parisch prest& louid a frend þat wonid
                    him nest…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…Oure lord ihesu crist vs spedeto don penaunce & thedir vs
                    lede

BLAdd22283.First Lines:
AN holy man was parische prestAnd loued a frend þat woned hym
                    nest…
BLAdd22283.Last Lines:
…Vre lord Ihesu crist vs spedeTo do penaunce & þider
                    vs lede. Amen

BLAdd38010.First Lines:
A haly man was parihsse presteAnd luffed a frende þat wonnide
                    him neste…
BLAdd38010.Last Lines:
…Oure lord Ihesu criste vs spedeTo do pennaunce &
                    þider vs lede. Amen

BLHar2391.First Lines: A holy man was parych prestAnd lufd a frend þat wond hym neyst…
BLHar2391.Last Lines: …Owr lord Ihesu crist vs spedeTo do penaunce & ȝedir vs lede
BLHar2391.Attributed Title: Dominica xiiii (left margin, f. 208v) with “A tale” written above

MinULZ822.First Lines:
Ane haly man was perryst presteþat louede a frende þat
                    wonned hym neste…
MinULZ822.Last Lines:
…oure lorde ihesu cryste vs spedeto do penaunce &
                    þedyr vs lede
MinULZ822.Attributed Title: How a haly preste [illegible] (added in the right margin, f. 138)

HunHM129.First Lines:
An holy man wos paroche presteAnd louyd a frend þat wonnyd hym
                    neste…
HunHM129.Last Lines:
…Þan may his sorow answere ryghtVn to þe lykynge off
                    his plyght
